short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Obtain table headers and hide them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Column Hide lets you hide any column in tables on websites. Simplify large tables by removing irrelevant data, allowing you to focus on what matters. Perfect for analysts or anyone dealing with complex web tables.
